modName: Fomod menu for FIX Combat Music
summary: An simple fomod menu for install the helpfull mod: "FIX Combat Music".
descriptionHtml:
[center]Its simple... in the NEXUS me found the mod for FIX the ThreatRatio in Skyrim.


The mod, you can found, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20926/?]HERE[/url].


[b]For use my fomod menu:[/b]

FIRST STEP - download the main files of [i]FIX Combat Music[/i] from the link,

SECOND STEP - download my fomod menu from FILES label in this mod page
(the file is .zip and you can use default windows file explorer),

THIRD STEP - copy the files .esp from original mod in my folders mod
(and add in your mod manager my .zip file modified).


Now you can save your time each time you use this mod!


[b]ENJOY


[/b]- - -[/center]


[b]Font used in image:[/b] [i]PostScriptum Light[/i] - Free to use licence

 - For questions or requests write to levi@loremipsum.ro[/size]

Thank you, "Levi" (the "NAME OF AUTOR" of font in page image)
author: Marco Colonna TOVOT
